channel.title: Bastion-rs blog
channel.description: Welcome to the official bastion-rs blog!

item.title: This is a post placeholder
item.description:
Here is a boilerplate you can modify to write your first blog post !

All of the markdown rules apply here.

For example, you can write something in italic like this, you can write in bold like that.

This is an h1 (big) title

This title is a bit smaller

This one is even more smaller etc.

Donâ€™t hesitate and visit mastering-markdown to get more information !

The name of the file is important !

This will generate the url, and complete the blog post meta informations (Such as the date for example).

A relevant page name, which matches the title pretty well might help Search Engine Optimization (Making sure the post is well referenced on search engines)
